import React from'react';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{addItem}from'../Redux/Actions/cartAction';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Items=_ref=>{let{product}=_ref;const dispatch=useDispatch();const data=useSelector(state=>state.cart);const addItemInCart=()=>{let add=true;data.forEach(element=>{if(element.id===product.id){add=false;}});//alert("Item Added...")
if(add){dispatch(addItem(product));if(localStorage.getItem('cart-items')){const tempArr=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart-items'));localStorage.setItem('cart-items',JSON.stringify([...tempArr,product]));}else{localStorage.setItem('cart-items',JSON.stringify([product]));}}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"items",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.thumbnail,alt:product.title,loading:"lazy"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Title : ",product.title]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Price : $ ",product.price]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addItemInCart,children:"Add To Cart"})]});};export default Items;
